DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , two-period , randomize , open-label , crossover pharmacokinetic ( PK ) study healthy adult volunteer evaluate dose proportionality diazepam nasal spray use two dose level
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study Assess Dose Proportionality , Safety Tolerability Diazepam Nasal Spray Healthy Adult Volunteers
